title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: self-hosted LLM runtime with a CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for LLM, chat, embeddings and tool-calling inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user) comparable to ChatGPT interface.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, and custom timeout support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template for Retrieval-Augmented Generation using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-cli (rust)
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model for private coding assistance.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, cancellation tokens and strongly-typed chat requests.

title: ollama-gui-react
summary: Lightweight React front-end that talks to Ollama’s REST endpoint for a ChatGPT-like experience.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) and docker-compose snippets for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector support.

title: ollama-rust-api
summary: Community Rust crate exposing strongly-typed async calls to Ollama REST endpoints; published on crates.io.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official NPM package providing JS/TS bindings for Ollama; zero dependencies, ESM & CommonJS.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama; install with pip and use Pythonic methods for chat, generate, pull, list.

title: ollama-reddit-community
summary: Active subreddit for troubleshooting, model recommendations, and showcasing Ollama integrations.

title: ollama-hackernews-discussion
summary: Hacker News thread discussing the release of Ollama v0.1.30 with tool-use and multimodal support.

title: ollama-youtube-overview
summary: Video walkthrough covering installation, pulling models, and integrating Ollama with LangChain for RAG.
